official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any legislation providing for the modification or federalization of medical assistance programs include optometric services and that the States be urged to seek to include or continue optometric services.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.
